external_games.name: Babe and Friends: Animated Preschool Adventure

name: Babe and Friends: Animated Preschool Adventure
summary: Babe and Friends: Animated Preschool Adventure (aka Babe und seine Freunde: Ein Abenteuer für Kinder im Vorschualter, Babe y sus amigos: Aventuras para los más pequeños) is a video game published in 1999 on Windows by TDK Recording Media Europe S.A.. It's an adventure and educational game, set in a math / logic and pre-school / toddler themes, and was also released on Mac.
